title: Installation issue: hdf5
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue
I am using the results of `spack containerize` to build some packages with intel-oneapi 2021.1 compilers.
*edit: I was able to reduce this problem.  See below*
```console
$ cat Dockerfile
FROM intel/oneapi-hpckit:2021.1-devel-centos8 as builder
LABEL maintainer "Tom Robinson"

#-------------------------------------------------------------
RUN yum install -y git
RUN yum install -y patch
## Set spack
RUN git clone -b v0.16.1 https://github.com/spack/spack.git /opt/spack
RUN . /opt/spack/share/spack/setup-env.sh \
 && spack compiler find \
 && spack debug report \
 && spack install hdf5@1.12.0~mpi+fortran %intel@2021.1 target=x86_64
$ docker build -t am4:intel_xanadu_2021.01 .
...
==> hdf5: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> hdf5: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-hdf5-1.12.0-vkvylfdw3h3csv5tmox5y2epwjtdhhbt/spack-src/configure' '--prefix=/opt/software/linux-centos8-x86_64/intel-2021.1/hdf5-1.12.0-vkvylfdw3h3csv5tmox5y2epwjtdhhbt' '--enable-unsupported' '--enable-symbols=yes' '--disable-threadsafe' '--disable-cxx' '--enable-hl' '--enable-fortran' '--disable-java' '--without-szlib' '--enable-build-mode=production' '--enable-shared' 'CFLAGS=-fPIC' 'CXXFLAGS=-fPIC' 'FCFLAGS=-fPIC' '--with-zlib=/opt/software/linux-centos8-x86_64/intel-2021.1/zlib-1.2.11-ly5uvjwhp3yksufjcaigevpz4pdawy5y'

1 error found in build log:
     88    checking for Fortran libraries of /opt/spack/lib/spack/env/intel/ifo
           rt...  -L/opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2021.1.1/linux/bin/intel64/../..
           /compiler/lib/intel64_lin -L/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/8/ -L/u
           sr/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/8/../../../../lib64 -L/usr/lib/gcc/x8
           6_64-redhat-linux/8/../../../../lib64/ -L/lib/../lib64 -L/lib/../lib
           64/ -L/usr/lib/../lib64 -L/usr/lib/../lib64/ -L/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-r
           edhat-linux/8/../../../ -L/lib64 -L/lib/ -L/usr/lib64 -L/usr/lib -li
           fport -lifcoremt_pic -limf -lsvml -lm -lipgo -lirc -lpthread -lirc_s
            -ldl
     89    checking for dummy main to link with Fortran libraries... none
     90    checking for Fortran name-mangling scheme... lower case, underscore,
            no extra underscore
     91    checking if Fortran compiler supports intrinsic SIZEOF... no
     92    checking if Fortran compiler supports intrinsic C_SIZEOF... no
     93    checking if Fortran compiler supports intrinsic STORAGE_SIZE... no
  >> 94    configure: error: Fortran compiler requires either intrinsic functio
           ns SIZEOF or STORAGE_SIZE

See build log for details:
  /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-hdf5-1.12.0-vkvylfdw3h3csv5tmox5y2epwjtdhhbt/spack-build-out.txt
```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
``` console
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.1
* **Python:** 3.7.9
* **Platform:** linux-centos8-x86_64
```

- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers

- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
